Está bueno el juego, es recomendable, pero se tiene que entender que es para dedicarle su tiempo, hay que ser paciente. Personalmente disfruté volver a jugarlo hasta el final porque me recuerda a mi infancia, en la que solo podía jugar la demo.

Looking forward to playing blue shift and opposing force, and offcourse half life 2 ! :) good times sake :)

Don't let nostalgia blind you. It's stil buggy, the invisible bullet spread is as insipid as it has ever been, meaning full-auto will render your bullets useless after a second, because the people who made this game never shot a gun in their lives. 

There are plenty of sudden-death traps requiring plenty of trial and error, because that's something every action fan loves. The levels are mostly linear, with dead-ends and sudden-death traps showing you otherwise. Not to mention that the aiming, for the weapons that do exist, is shit. The weapons handle like shit, are mostly boring and completely secondary to playing the game. 

Most of the time you will be exploiting cover, exploting the stupid ai, waiting for the insta-death helicopters to fly past you (because waiting and doing nothing for extended periods of time is fun and meaningful), navigating the mazes with death traps. 

If anything, this game has always been overrated and I've never completed this game ever, nor will I, because of how boring it ends up being towards the end. 

There are plenty of good games showcasing GOOD aspects of nostalgic shooters, this has never been one of them. Shooting games should have satisfying guns, good shooting mechanics and if there are puzzles, make them interesting, not tedious.

This game is great. The graphics may not be up to scratch but the game was made a long time ago and graphics don’t make a game. The gameplay is very good in this title and it features an ok story although I haven’t gotten far enough through the game to realise the extent of the story so far. This game is definitely worth picking up when on sale but I can’t justify the $12 regular price tag. The game will give you hours of fun and challenge your mind although can be frustrating when you get stuck. I’ll give this game a 7/10.

Half-Life: Pierwsza gra stworzona i wydana przez Valve Softwares 19 listopada 1998 roku. Jest to jedna z najlepszych gier którą można kupić na Steam. Dlatego zamierzam opisać jej wady i zalety.

Zalety:
+ bogata historia
+ masa różnych broni
+ akcja
+ poziomy trudności dostosowane do gracza
+ beka na cheatach

Wady:
- Słaba grafika (ale wiadomo jak na tamte czasy...)
- Glitche
- Długi początek gry

Ocena:
Grafika: 8/10 (daje specjalnie wyższą)
Zabawa: 10/10
Akcja: 9/10
Inteligencja N.P.C: 10/10
Ogólne: 9,5/10

Half Life y Gordon Freeman son icónicos para PC, hasta me atrevería decir que el juego más popular para ordenador es Half Life, como lo es Mario Bros para Nintendo.

Simplemente maravilloso, uno de los mejores juegos que he podido jugar a lo largo de mi corta vida videojueguil, ahora ire a por las expansiones de este half-life y luego iré a jugar el 2. Es un milagro videojugabilístico para la época en la que salió (1998), es cierto que no es perfecto a día de hoy, pero en su época era dado por seguro el mejor First Person Shooter, combina historia, jugabilidad(salvo zonas de plataformas), dificultad, banda sonora y uso del escenario de una forma esplendida. Sabía que me gustaría Half-Life pero nunca a estos niveles, os recomiendo esta versión sobre todo para que veais la pedazo de obra maestra que se hizo con tan poca tecnología. Si no sois muy dados a jugar juegos antiguos os recomiendo probar el remake (Half-Life Source). Pero ya acabando le doy un 9,95/10 (Sería un 10 pero Freeman tiene prácticamente zapatos untados en mantequilla y hace un poco frustantes las zonas de plataformas)

Я купил эту игру и оказалось что есть Half-Life Source где игра на рус языке и где изменена физика. И что мне теперь делать? Ещё платить деньги за ту же игру? Почему нельзя было просто выпустить обновление для Half-Life?

Ну что сказать, не зря купил лицензию. 
Лучшая игра 90-2000ых годов, даже сейчас она остаёться одной из самых лучших, просто даже мне всё больше режит глаза графен. Но игра топ.

Хоть игре 20 лет,но до сих пор есть атмосфера.
Предлагаю сыграть сначала оригинал 1998 года,а потом ремастер Black Mesa.

Half Life is arguably, without a doubt," The Best Videogame Of The Year of 1998.
By the way, It's actually "The Best Videogame Of All Time".
It was released 20 years ago, so time of releasing a game doesn't matter. 
- The story is FANTASTIC, because they really build up a very good plot with different scenes! (10/10).
- The player Gordon Freeman is FUNNY! (10/10).
- The graphics are AWESOME (10/10, but realize it are graphcis from 1998, so for that time it was AMAZING).
- The sound is HIGH QUALITY, Its maybe a little bit loud, but that's okay.

So, If you like Science-Fiction games, I REALLY RECOMMEND YOU THIS GAME!!! 
A MUST HAVE FOR EVERY GAMER!!!
Every Half-Life game is perfect. But in HL1, you get lost very easily or you get annoyed from the enemy spam. 9/10

i love classic games, i've been playing them forever

but not every game ages well, and this is an example. overall gameplay is frustrating, linear but with no real direction so youre never sure if youre actually doing the right thing, and movement  macanic is whats killing me the most. I always woundered why everyone put this game on such a high pedestal and maybe in its prime day but even so ive played late 90s games that didnt make me just stop playing to not get so upset. Lmao not like they can change an old game, this is jsut for those who are thinking about it

[b] I bought this game with the Half Life 1 Anthology. [/b]
Can we all just agree that Half Life as a series is the best FPS series out there?

[i] (TL;DR at bottom.) [/i]

In Half Life, you play as Gordon Freeman, a scientist at Black Mesa, running late for work. You work at a lab that runs test on anomalies and such. It seems like a normal day at work, until you enter the test chamber and something goes horribly wrong. Creatures from a strange place called [i] "Xen" [/i] seemingly teleport in and ruin the whole place. Everything is going wrong, and you have to escape. Now, the rest is up to you, as the story in this game is amazingly showcased, with the famous style that Half Life has. 

The gameplay of Half Life feels like that classic 90's feel. (of course) It doesn't have those arrows in modern games saying "Go here!" "Go there!" All that crap. Instead, you have to navigate through the puzzles by yourself, and it really makes the game more immersive. Also, I love Half Life because of the weapon selection, like come on, a hand that shoots bees? It's honestly amazing. I also like how the game introduces mechanics to you. It doesn't throw stuff at you and expects you to do it, [i] *cough cough hdtf cough cough* [/i] it uses the "Tell, Show, Do" system of teaching you stuff.

Overall, Half Life is a really nice game. If you don't have it yet, I'd get the anthology or wait for a sale. Or if you really want to get it, go for it. It's worth it. Anyways, time for TL;DR.

[b] TL;DR - Half Life has good mechanics, storyline, and overall, it's worth it. [/b]

Халф лайф, Half-Life, период полураспада, халва, полу-жизнь.
У этого явления много названий, и я не про настоящий период полураспада, о нет, я про шедевр игровой индустрии, перевернувший представление о шутерах, вы знаете о чем я...

HALF-LIFE

Игра располагает многими плюсами и немногими минусами, о которых я сейчас поведаю:

ПЛЮСЫ
1. Стильная графика, которая даже спустя 20 лет после выхода смотриться сочно и приятно.
2. Отличная шутерная механика, радующая простотой и удобством.
3. Разнообразие противников, которое не даёт заскучать на протяжении игры.
4. Большое кол-во модов, среди которых встречаются действительно неплохие.

МИНУСЫ
1. Звук на 2018г. звучит довольно слабо, в отличие от графики.
2. Неудобство запуска отдельных карт.

Об этой игре можно писать очень долго, я же стараюсь быть лаконичным, т.к. краткость - сестра таланта.

ИТОГ
